item.title: Tight On Wall Space, SFMOMA Will Text Its Art To You Instead
item.description: July 18, 2017 - The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art can only display a fraction of its collection at any given time. Now, you can text a word or emoji and the museum will send back a corresponding work of art.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 18, 2017 - The San Francisco Museum of Modern Art can only display a fraction of its collection at any given time. Now, you can text a word or emoji and the museum will send back a corresponding work of art. http://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/18/537737939/tight-on-wall-space-sfmoma-will-text-its-art-to-you-instead

item.title: Elon Musk: Artificial Intelligence Poses 'Existential Risk'
item.description: July 18, 2017 - Elon Musk, the billionaire scientist behind Tesla Motors and SpaceX, made a dire warning over the weekend about the future of artificial intelligence to a room full of state leaders.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 18, 2017 - Elon Musk, the billionaire scientist behind Tesla Motors and SpaceX, made a dire warning over the weekend about the future of artificial intelligence to a room full of state leaders. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/18/537844706/elon-musk-artificial-intelligence-poses-existential-risk

item.title: News Brief: Health Care Bill Is Dead, Russian Compound Discussions
item.description: July 18, 2017 - When 2 GOP senators said they would vote no on a bill to replace Obamacare, it effectively killed the bill. U.S. and Russian diplomats are discussing 2 Russian compounds that U.S. authorities seized.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 18, 2017 - When 2 GOP senators said they would vote no on a bill to replace Obamacare, it effectively killed the bill. U.S. and Russian diplomats are discussing 2 Russian compounds that U.S. authorities seized. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/18/537844678/morning-news-brief-health-care-bill-is-dead-russian-compound-discussions

item.title: Meet The Other Robotics Team That Almost Didn't Make It To The Competition
item.description: July 17, 2017 - The team from Gambia was denied visas when they first applied. "Having no hope to come, we still worked," says team captain Alieu Bah.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - The team from Gambia was denied visas when they first applied. "Having no hope to come, we still worked," says team captain Alieu Bah. http://www.npr.org/sections/goatsandsoda/2017/07/17/537732623/meet-the-other-robotics-team-that-almost-didnt-make-it-to-the-competition

item.title: Seeking Online Medical Advice? Google's Top Results Aren't Always On Target
item.description: July 17, 2017 - Google's search results on health issues can be influential, but they can also be unreliable or wrong. The highlighted answer may come from a dubious source while a more credible one is buried below.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - Google's search results on health issues can be influential, but they can also be unreliable or wrong. The highlighted answer may come from a dubious source while a more credible one is buried below. http://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2017/07/17/537711453/seeking-online-medical-advice-googles-top-results-arent-always-on-target

item.title: Students Compete In First-Ever International High School Robotics Competition
item.description: July 17, 2017 - The first ever international high school robotics competition is happening in Washington, D.C., this week. Over 150 countries from six continents sent teams to compete.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - The first ever international high school robotics competition is happening in Washington, D.C., this week. Over 150 countries from six continents sent teams to compete. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/17/537754562/students-compete-in-first-ever-international-high-school-robotics-competition

item.title: His Alleged Email Scam Swindled $100 Million. Now, He's Set To Be Extradited
item.description: July 17, 2017 - Evaldas Rimasauskas is accused of crafting a massive scheme to defraud Google and Facebook of more than $100 million. But the Lithuanian national will appeal the extradition order handed down Monday.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - Evaldas Rimasauskas is accused of crafting a massive scheme to defraud Google and Facebook of more than $100 million. But the Lithuanian national will appeal the extradition order handed down Monday. http://www.npr.org/sections/thetwo-way/2017/07/17/537713538/his-alleged-email-scam-swindled-100-million-now-hes-set-to-be-extradited

item.title: Tech Workers Brace For Seattle's Plan to 'Tax The Rich'
item.description: July 17, 2017 - Seattle is among a number of cities in which the tech boom is driving up the cost of living. Now tech workers are facing a new city income tax on the highest earners to help those who make less.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - Seattle is among a number of cities in which the tech boom is driving up the cost of living. Now tech workers are facing a new city income tax on the highest earners to help those who make less. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/17/537463986/tech-workers-brace-for-seattles-plan-to-tax-the-rich

item.title: Elon Musk Warns Governors: Artificial Intelligence Poses 'Existential Risk'
item.description: July 17, 2017 - At a bipartisan governors conference in Rhode Island, the CEO of Tesla urged politicians to impose proactive regulations on AI development.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - At a bipartisan governors conference in Rhode Island, the CEO of Tesla urged politicians to impose proactive regulations on AI development. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/17/537686649/elon-musk-warns-governors-artificial-intelligence-poses-existential-risk

item.title: Technology Can Be A Tool, A Teacher, A Trickster
item.description: July 17, 2017 - Shaping technology to some form of learning could depart pretty radically from the more familiar aim of shaping technology to the way we are now, says psychologist Tania Lombrozo.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - Shaping technology to some form of learning could depart pretty radically from the more familiar aim of shaping technology to the way we are now, says psychologist Tania Lombrozo. http://www.npr.org/sections/13.7/2017/07/17/537667988/technology-can-be-a-tool-a-teacher-a-trickster

item.title: Legal Challenges Expected As Seattle Approves Income Tax On High Earners
item.description: July 17, 2017 - Seattle is among a number of cities in which the tech boom is driving up the cost of living. The highly paid tech workers there are expected to pay a new city income tax to help those who make less.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 17, 2017 - Seattle is among a number of cities in which the tech boom is driving up the cost of living. The highly paid tech workers there are expected to pay a new city income tax to help those who make less. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/17/537645901/legal-challenges-expected-as-seattle-approves-income-tax-on-high-earners

item.title: Coast Guard Works To Weed Out Hoax Distress Calls
item.description: July 15, 2017 - Every year, the Coast Guard wastes valuable resources and crew on as many as 150 fraud calls. Scott Simon talks with the Coast Guard's Branch Chief Al Arsenault about using voice forensics for help.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 15, 2017 - Every year, the Coast Guard wastes valuable resources and crew on as many as 150 fraud calls. Scott Simon talks with the Coast Guard's Branch Chief Al Arsenault about using voice forensics for help. http://www.npr.org/2017/07/15/537381231/coast-guard-works-to-weed-out-hoax-distress-calls

item.title: This 10-Pound Keyboard From The 1980s Is Making A Comeback
item.description: July 14, 2017 - IBM's Model F keyboard was manufactured from 1981 until 1994 and cost hundreds of dollars. Computer aficionados treasure it, but it's hard to find these days. So one man is working to bring it back.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 14, 2017 - IBM's Model F keyboard was manufactured from 1981 until 1994 and cost hundreds of dollars. Computer aficionados treasure it, but it's hard to find these days. So one man is working to bring it back. http://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/14/537290841/this-10-pound-keyboard-from-the-1980s-is-making-a-comeback

item.title: Cell Towers At Schools: Godsend Or God-Awful?
item.description: July 14, 2017 - School districts are making deals with telecom companies to build towers on school property. The agreements give schools a bump in revenue, but what do parents think? And what does the science say?
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 14, 2017 - School districts are making deals with telecom companies to build towers on school property. The agreements give schools a bump in revenue, but what do parents think? And what does the science say? http://www.npr.org/sections/ed/2017/07/14/535403513/cell-towers-at-schools-godsend-or-god-awful

item.title: Computer Scientists Demonstrate The Potential For Faking Video
item.description: July 14, 2017 - Fake news articles may just be the tip of the iceberg. New research — which manipulates footage of former President Obama — shows it's possible to create fake news videos too.
item.itunes:author: podcasts@npr.org (NPR Podcasts)
item.itunes:summary: July 14, 2017 - Fake news articles may just be the tip of the iceberg. New research — which manipulates footage of former President Obama — shows it's possible to create fake news videos too. http://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/14/537154304/computer-scientists-demonstrate-the-potential-for-faking-video
